segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and I’m shocked the woman hasn’t noticed yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so bold, taking cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m amazed at how unaware she is of everything going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is really pushing his luck—I can’t believe he’s not falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s incredible how much is happening in this one moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, like she’s waiting for a cookie to drop into her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised the woman hasn’t slipped on the wet floor yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the light comes through the window, it’s like the outside world is perfect, but inside is chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything looks from a distance, but up close, it’s a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is full of surprises, and I can’t look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m really taken aback by how much is going unnoticed here.
segments.speaker: PAR
